entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 31 Oct 2023 08:03:38
entry.summary:
Tech:
- After watching Russia's and Ukraine's electronic warriors battle it out, the US military wants to 'dial up' up its own 'jamming power'
- NASA's James Webb Space Telescope imaged a stunning supernova remnant and revealed details Hubble couldn't capture
- Google Brain founder says big tech is lying about AI danger
- AI Startups Fear That Bidenâ€™s AI Executive Order Could Stifle Innovation
- Webinar: Accelerate AV Development with NVIDIA DGX Cloud and NVIDIA AI Enterprise
- Podcast: Amdocs' Victoria Myers on How Employees See AI and ... - HCM Technology Report
- Functionality in Equitation: Eyes Are Important For The Movement - | Eurodressage
- Q&A: White House AI advisor says US is 'catching up' to the tech, as Biden's new executive order demands transparency for the world's biggest AI models
- Vanguard CEO says asset-management giant won't pursue a bitcoin ETF, unlike rivals
- Japan's farmers are getting too old to work the land. 5G-powered smart tech is doing the heavy lifting for them.

Business:
- Coppell's Wiley relishing final season to coach son, Amari'a - Star Local Media
- Billionaire hedge fund boss Ken Griffin pays for 1,200 staff and family members to visit Disney Tokyo and hear performances by Maroon 5 and Calvin Harris
- Drugmakers Are Set to Pay 23andMe Millions to Access Consumer DNA
- McConnell fights for his legacy as he sells a divided GOP on Ukraine funding
- Biden's Education Department reveals the 4 groups of student-loan borrowers it's prioritizing for its second attempt at debt relief
- Dow soars more than 500 points as stocks jump amid easing Mideast conflict fears

AI:
- Sam Bankman-Fried can't get past the fundamental flaw in his defense strategy
- Judge pares down artists' AI copyright lawsuit against Midjourney, Stability AI

Other:
- Lynvol Arthur Obituary - Wiley Funeral Home - Granbury - 2023 - Legacy.com
- Best Mortgage Lenders for Low or Bad Credit Scores of November 2023
- World Series live stream 2023: Where to watch Rangers vs. Diamondbacks Game 3 online from anywhere
- Noah Fifita Earns Third Pac-12 Freshman of the Week Honor ... - University of Arizona Athletics
- Best Cancel for Any Reason (CFAR) Travel Insurance Plans of November 2023
- Best Banks and Credit Unions for Military Members and Their Families, November 2023
- A tumultuous withdrawal from Afghanistan gave independents a reason to ditch Biden. The conflict in Israel and Gaza could do the same thing for Democrats.

Insights:
- The US military is looking to enhance its electronic warfare capabilities after observing the battles between Russia and Ukraine.
- NASA's James Webb Space Telescope has provided detailed images of a supernova remnant that were beyond the capabilities of the Hubble Space Telescope.
- There are concerns about the potential dangers of AI, with some accusing big tech companies of downplaying the risks.
- The AI industry is worried that Biden's AI executive order may hinder innovation.
- Vanguard CEO has stated that the company will not pursue a bitcoin ETF, setting it apart from its competitors.
- Japan's aging farming population is turning to smart technology, powered by 5G, to assist with agricultural work.
- Billionaire Ken Griffin treated his staff and their families to a trip to Disney Tokyo, featuring performances by Maroon 5 and Calvin Harris.
- The stock market experienced a significant increase, with the Dow soaring over 500 points, due to easing fears of conflict in the Middle East.
- Student loan borrowers and debt relief are a priority for Biden's Education Department.
- The withdrawal from Afghanistan and the conflict in Israel and Gaza have had political implications for both Democrats and Republicans.
